title: David Jaffe's Insane PlayStation Interview - PS I Love You XOXO
description:
What happens when Greg Miller interviews PlayStation icon David Jaffe? Madness. Join us for an all over the map interview that brings in Tim Schafer, Shannon Studstill, and Kevin. (Released 12.17.15)

Subscribe! https://www.youtube.com/user/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Get you PS I Love You XOXO shirts and posters: http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Submit questions for the show here: http://www.kindafunny.com/psq

This video was edited on an ORIGIN PC EVO15-S Laptop. Get your PC here: http://www.ORIGINPC.com

Greg and Colin are back with a weekly PlayStation podcast. Catch it on YouTube and podcast services each and every Tuesday at 9 a.m. PT!

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/kindafunnyvids

Music by Rakohus!: http://www.youtube.com/user/rakohus
